attributes.action: Ban London cycle hire & bus tours because they are nicking black taxi customers
attributes.additional_details: Evidence : black taxi drivers now shop at sainsburys where as they used to shop at waitrose.
attributes.background: I believe the london cycle hire and bus tours are taking money away from black taxi drivers and are they are not really British. I believe that monopolies are great for capitalism because it puts all the profits into the hands of a few and evaporates competition in return creating price fixing

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. London cycle hires and bus tours are the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
